statements: SELECT * FROM returns_monitoring WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, return_cost FROM returns_monitoring WHERE processing_time > 5;
SELECT return_date, return_reason FROM returns_monitoring WHERE return_cost < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM returns_monitoring WHERE return_id = 10 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returns_monitoring WHERE processing_time < 3 ORDER BY return_cost ASC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_date, return_reason, return_cost, processing_time FROM returns_monitoring;
SELECT product_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns_monitoring WHERE return_id = 100;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns_monitoring WHERE return_cost > 50.00;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_cost FROM returns_monitoring WHERE processing_time < 5;
SELECT * FROM returns_monitoring WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT return_cost_id, return_date, return_reason, cost FROM return_costs;
SELECT * FROM return_costs ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_cost_id, return_reason FROM return_costs WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM return_costs WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_costs WHERE return_cost_id = 1;
SELECT return_reason, cost FROM return_costs WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM return_costs ORDER BY return_date DESC, cost DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM return_costs;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT order_id, return_date, return_reason, return_cost FROM return_costs;
SELECT return_date, return_cost, return_reason, order_id FROM return_costs;
SELECT return_reason, return_cost, order_id, return_date FROM return_costs;
SELECT metric_id, order_id, return_rate, processing_time FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT processing_time, metric_id, return_rate, order_id FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM return_costs WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT return_date, return_cost FROM return_costs ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE return_rate > 3;
SELECT return_reason, AVG(return_cost) FROM return_costs GROUP BY return_reason;
SELECT p.metric_id, p.order_id, o.optimization_strategy FROM performance_metrics p JOIN process_optimization o ON p.metric_id = o.metric_id ORDER BY p.order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM return_costs WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT return_date, return_reason FROM return_costs ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_cost FROM return_costs WHERE return_reason = 'Damaged';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date >= '2022-01-01' AND metric_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_cost FROM return_costs ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_reason, return_cost FROM return_costs WHERE return_cost > 100 ORDER BY return_cost ASC;
SELECT reduction_name, reduction_amount FROM cost_reduction WHERE reduction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY reduction_amount DESC;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM process_optimization WHERE process_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM return_costs;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_cost FROM return_costs WHERE return_cost > 100;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM return_costs WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT return_id, processing_time, processing_status FROM return_performance ORDER BY processing_time DESC;
SELECT metrics_id, return_quantity, restocking_time, restocking_cost FROM return_metrics WHERE return_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM return_costs;
SELECT return_id, return_reason, return_cost FROM return_costs WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, return_quantity, restocking_time, restocking_cost FROM return_metrics WHERE metrics_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM return_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT return_id, processing_time, processing_status, shipping_cost FROM return_performance WHERE processing_status = 'completed';
